sections.heading: Living in open adultery.798.02Lewd and lascivious behavior.
sections.text: in open adultery.798.02Lewd and lascivious behavior.

sections.heading: Lewd and lascivious behavior.
sections.text: 798.02 Lewd and lascivious behavior.—If any man or woman, married or unmarried, engages in open and gross lewdness and lascivious behavior, they shall be guilty of a misdemeanor of the second degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082 or s. 775.083. History.—s. 6, ch. 1637, 1868; RS 2596; GS 3519; RGS 5407; CGL 7550; s. 773, ch. 71-136; s. 1, ch. 2016-188.
